docs.summary:
The wix-stores module contains functionality for working with your
 site's store from from client-side code.
description: To use the Stores API, import `wixStores` from the `wix-stores` module:
```javascript
import wixStores from 'wix-stores';

params.name: productId
params.doc: The ID of the product whose availability is being checked.

params.name: choices
params.doc: Option choices to use when checking the product's availability.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The availability information of the product.

docs.summary: Gets the availability of a product based on the specified option choices.
description: The `getProductOptionsAvailability()` function returns a Promise that is resolved
to a `ProductOptionsAvailability` object when the product's availability information
about the product is retrieved.
The information returned in the `selectedVariant` and `availableForPurchase`
properties reflects the option choices passed in using the `ProductChoices`
parameter.
If the specified choices result in the selection of a single product variant,
that variant is returned in the `selectedVariant` property and the `availableForPurchase`
property indicates whether that product variant is available for purchase.
If the specified choices do not result in the selection of a single product variant,
no variant is returned in the `selectedVariant` property and the `availableForPurchase`
property will be `false`.

extra.description:
This example gets a product's availability information using an option choice.
 The product contains more than one option, so no variant is selected and the
 product with the specified choices is not available for purchase.

This example gets a product's availability information using multiple option choices.
 Since all the product's options have a corresponding choice, a variant is selected.

params.name: productId
params.doc: The ID of the product whose variants are being retrieved.

params.name: options
params.doc: Option to use when checking the product's variants.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The variants with the specified choices.

docs.summary: Gets a product's available variants based on the specified option choices.
description: The `getProductVariants()` function returns a Promise that is resolved
to a `VariantList` object when the product variants with the specified
choices or variant IDs are retrieved.

examples.title: Get product variants by specified choices
Get product variants by variant IDs
Get product variants using paging options

docs.summary: An object representing a media item.
description: The `src` property of a `MediaItem` can be an image or video from the Media Manager.
The image source format for Media Manager images is:
`wix:image://v1/<uri>/<filename>#originWidth=<width>&originHeight=<height>[&watermark=<watermark_manifest_string>]`
The video source format is:
`wix:video://v1/<video_uri>/<filename>#posterUri=<poster_uri>&posterWidth=<width>&posterHeight=<height>`

members.name: type
members.doc: Media items type. Can be "image" or "video."

docs.summary: An object representing paging options.

examples.title: Get product variants using paging options

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of variants to retrieve. Defaults to 300.

members.name: skip
members.doc: Number of variants to skip before the retrieved variants. Defaults to 0.

docs.summary: An object representing an additional info section for a store product.
An object representing a product variant's option choices.

examples.title: Get product variants by specified choices

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Value of the choice. This key name is
 dependent on the product option. For example, if a product
 has a size option, this key value will be something like "Size" and its value
 will be something like "Large".
 
 `optionKey` is not case-sensitive. Therefore the values for the option keys "`Size`", "`SIZE`", and "`size`" are combined.

docs.summary: An object representing a custom text field for a store product.

members.name: maxLength
members.doc: Maximum length of product customization field in characters.

docs.summary: An object representing a product discount.
An object representing an option for a store product.
An object representing all the available options for a store product, such as "Size" or "Color".
description: An option cannot be changed if it has choices and variants. To change an option, reset its variants with [`resetVariantData()`](https://www.wix.com/corvid/reference/wix-stores-backend.html#resetVariantData). For each option, you can define a maximum of six choices.

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Name of the option. This key name
 is dependent on the options added to the product. For example, if a product has a size 
 option, this key will be something like `"Size"`.
 
 `optionKey` is not case-sensitive. Therefore the values for the option keys "`Size`", "`SIZE`", and "`size`" are combined.

docs.summary: An object returned by the `getProductOptionsAvailability()` function representing the availability of a product.

members.name: availableForPurchase
members.doc: Whether the product with the specified option choices is available for purchase.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: An object representing all the available options for a store product.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image or video) URL.

members.name: selectedVariant
members.doc: The variant of the product selected using the specified option choices if there is one.

docs.summary: An object representing the product variant selected using the `getProductOptionsAvailability()` function.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Product variant stock keeping unit value.

members.name: price
members.doc: Product variant price. The variant price must be greater than its discount.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Product variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the product variant is shown in the store.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the product variant is in stock.

docs.summary: An object representing an options choice for a store product for a store product, such as choice "Small" for the option "Size."
description: You can define between one and thirty choices for each option.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Indicates whether the product with this choice is in stock.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Indicates whether the product with this option is visible.

docs.summary: An object representing the choice media.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main choice media item (image or video thumbnail) URL.

docs.summary: An object representing a ribbon for a store product.
An object representing a product's variant information, used when creating or updating variants.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible in the store.

docs.summary: An object representing a product's variant item.

An object representing the selection of specific variants of a product. Use only one of
 `choices` or `variantIds`.

examples.title: Get product variants using paging options
Get product variants by variant IDs

members.name: choices
members.doc: The choices the retrieved variants will have.

docs.summary: An object representing a product's variants.
An object containing variant information to use when creating or updating variants.

examples.title: Get product variants by specified choices

members.name: price
members.doc: Variant price. The variant price must be greater than its discount. If the variant price has been updated, changes to the product price do not affect the variant price.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the variant is visible in the store.

docs.summary: An object representing a product variant item.

examples.title: Get product variants by specified choices
Get product variants by specified choices

members.name: choices
members.doc: The choices of the retrieved variant.

docs.summary: An object representing product variants.

examples.title: Get product variants by specified choices

members.name: items
members.doc: List of variant items that match the specified choices or variant IDs.

members.name: length
members.doc: Number of items in the current results page.

members.name: totalCount
members.doc: Total number of variants with the specified choices.

notes:
Additional Stores related APIs can be found in the [`CartIcon`]($w.CartIcon.html)
 and [`ProductPage`]($w.ProductPage.html) elements.
